title: when are we going to get our "year in review"?

replies.body: [Here u go](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/year-in-review-2017#/)

https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/year-in-review-2017#/summoner/na/sixdogman

Oh danger, you just showed me that my stats across the board in my main role (support) are better than the challenger averages. Wards, damage mitigated, kda, everything.... I only get beat in damage dealt by bronze supports. I guess i have a thing or two to learn from them.

Some of those stat comparisons are pretty bad.  Especially gold per min, KDA, damage dealt.

Like... I have better KDA than challenger players and equal gold per min.  But if I were actually facing challenger opponents I would have much worse KDA and worse gold per min.
I mean, I'm just here facing challenged opponents on a daily basis, no big deal.

> [{quoted}](name=RavenMagus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wbJE5bYV,comment-id=000a00010000,timestamp=2017-12-19T00:51:13.172+0000)
>
> Some of those stat comparisons are pretty bad.  Especially gold per min, KDA, damage dealt.
> 
> Like... I have better KDA than challenger players and equal gold per min.  But if I were actually facing challenger opponents I would have much worse KDA and worse gold per min.

I don't feel the GP/min is accurate as well. I have horrific CSing kills, and it say's I make more gold a minute as well.
I had no idea this was even in the works and was a pretty cool surprise when I logged in yesterday.  Tell your fellow employees good job, positive feedback, etc.
Question: some people are telling me they have a "friends" section, but I don't, despite regularly playing with friends. Do you know what's up with that?

why does mine show pentakill kayle, just feels like it's rubbing in that I dont own the skin, #RitoPLZ

This year's review might actually cause me to kill myself ;.; it's been a horrible year for me...

[EDIT]
Figuratively kill myself.
what is a year in review

It is a personal review that Riot creates (automatically of course) for each player who played during that season
It will give you in depth statistics about the games that you played during the years
For example, it will give you
1. Overall Winrate
2. Your worst winrate against a specific champion
3. Most deaths to a specific champion
4. Best winrate against a specific champion
5. Most kills against a specific champion
6. Amount of Pentakills
7. Champion you got the most pentakills with
8. Most frequest kill locations
9. Most frequent death locations
10. Best KDA ratio
11. Highest winrate with a friend
And much more

I'd guess early January like last time.  They could surprise us though.

It was so fun to look through.
December 13th last year, not like I'm keepin tabs on this tho>.>

I'd like to point out that Season 7 started on December 7th, so that was 6 days **after** the new season started.  Based on this it would be a safe bet to say late January for this years year in review.
I didn't even think about that, bummer.
Boy was I ever wrong.  I don't think I've ever been this happy to be wrong in my life lol.
I hate waiting rip.
Boy was I ever wrong.  I don't think I've ever been this happy to be wrong in my life lol.
